CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(AcctSeed__Type__c, 'Bank') , AcctSeed__Ending_Balance__c + AcctSeed__UnCleared_Deposits__c - AcctSeed__UnCleared_Payments__c , AcctSeed__Ending_Balance__c - AcctSeed__UnCleared_Deposits__c + AcctSeed__UnCleared_Payments__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If bank, calculated as statement ending balance + uncleared deposits - uncleared payments. If credit card, calculated as statement ending balance - uncleared payments + uncleared charges.
CustomField.label: Calculated Balance
